info.name: E_Commerce API
info.description: _This is an E-commerce API that allows users and an authorized admin to effectively interract with a business website._

request.description: This endpoint reads the user id from a token passed and gets the user details from that token
Uses uniqueemail address to get the user details

item.description: _This folder handles how users interract with the system. It allows log ins, registration and deactivation of accounts in thee business database._

request.description: This endpoint allows a user to get a list of all the products in the database on log in

request.description: This Endpoint takes in a product ID as a parameter and returns te product detailed to a logged in user

item.name: Add a product to the database

request.description: This endpoint allows only a verified admin to add a product to the database.

response.name: Not an admin trying to add to the database
Authorized Admin adding new product to the database to the database

request.description: This endpoint allows an authorized Admin to update a product

response.name: Not an admin trying to Update Product

request.description: This endpoint allows an admin to delete a product from the database

response.name: Not an admin trying to remove a product from the database

request.description: This allows a logged in user to add an item to their cart by using a product id
This endpoint allows a user to get all the items of a user in the cart

item.name: reduce item count in the cart

request.description: This endpoint allows a user to reduce the quantity of a product in the cart if it already exists.

response.name: reduce item count in the cart

request.description: This allows a user to remove an item from the cart regardless of the quantity

item.name: clear the cart of a user

request.description: This endpoint allows a user to clear the cart of a user. Removes all items

response.name: clear the cart of a user

item.name: Admin getting all the orders on the system

request.description: This endpoint allows an authorixed Admin to get all the orders in the system.

response.name: Admin getting all the orders on the system

request.description: This endpoint fetches all the items in the cart at a particular point and makes an order with all the items in the cart.

item.name: Admin marking an order as complete

request.description: This endpoint allows an authorized admin to mark the order status as completed on delivery

response.name: Admin marking an order as complete

request.description: This endpoint allows a user to cancel an order that they made
